manual.title: CompileInfo
manual.strapline: Build and Compilation Information on RISC OS

The source for CompileInfo can be found on GitHub, at .
This is a complete list of all the changes made to the publicly released versions of Compile Info.

section.title: Test Build ()
section.p: First alpha release, for testing and feedback.

section.title: Updates and Contacting Me
section.p: If you have any comments about CompileInfo, or would like to report any bugs that you find, you can email me at the address below.
Updates to CompileInfo and more software for RISC OS computers can be found on my website at .
